section.title: The Px problem
section.p: Of all Px-case combinations, some are generated, others are not. The smj-lex.txt file says "! ess & ill pl do not use Px that often, left out". But there are more forms that are left out, and the coverage differs from stem class to stem class.
These are not generated for muorra: Essive, and plural of Nom, Gen, Ill, Com.

section.title: Diminutives of odd-syllable nouns
section.p: They got the wrong stem input to DenominalNounsODD:
section.source:
gámas+N+Dim+N+Sg+Nom gámas+N+Dim+N+Sg+Nom gábmassj
gámas+N+Dim+N+Sg+Gen gámas+N+Dim+N+Sg+Gen gábmasttja
section.p: An -a- was added before the Dim suffix. Check this!
